product_name: Levi's Commuter 511 Slim Fit Bike Trouser Shorts - Men's
long_description: Designed by and for urban cyclists, the men's Levi's 511 Slim Fit Bike Commuter Trouser Shorts give you stretch for the saddle and style for the post-ride pub stop. Stretchy twill fabric moves easily with you, whether you're riding or strolling through the city. Water-resistant and dirt-repellent Schoeller NanoSphere(R) protective finish helps fend off light rain, mud and road grit. Odor-resistant finish helps keep sweaty odors from developing. U-lock holster is integrated with back waistband to make it easy to carry your lock as you ride. Double-layered seat and rear pockets protect shorts from saddle wear. Flipping up the cuffs exposes 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflective tape, which helps boost your visibility. Levi's 511 Slim Fit Bike Commuter Trouser Shorts for men feature a higher back rise for added coverage while riding.
short_description: Designed by and for urban cyclists, the men's Levi's 511 Slim Fit Bike Commuter Trouser Shorts give you stretch for the saddle and style for the post-ride pub stop.
